name: Left at Space | Team 5
description:
Hi!

Left at Space is a simple sci-fi survival game. In the game, you find yourself on an unknown planet. You were brought to this planet by a mysterious force that shot your ship down. To return back home, you must find ubonatium ore - a fuel source. You go and scavange around, but quickly realize you are not alone. You must defend yourself against monsters by fighting and setting traps while you scavange for fuel.

The game takes about 10 minutes to complete and is best played right here on itch.io.

Thank you for checking Left at Space, we hope you enjoy our first game!
